Ready to unlock the door to your future?  Join hands with Habitat and make your dream of owning a home a reality in 2024!    Apply today! 🔑💙 #Homeownership #DreamBig   https://t.co/9yRserHnpk https://t.co/h9HY62mzRt
Coming off the heels of our fall build, Oak Hills Church is back to support Habitat's mission in our spring build. Thank you for your dedication and commitment to changing our community. 🙌 #OakHillsChurch #Springbuild https://t.co/Qogz0pSgDg
Join us on April 12th for our Habitour! Learn how to become a part of Habitat's efforts to provide homes to families in Bexar and Guadalupe counties.  Register today by clicking the link: https://t.co/PzunrWY69B #Buildforbetter #LearnaboutHabitat https://t.co/j1ULGK4PGs
Join us now for our April Habitour! Experience Habitat’s mission firsthand as we build homes for families in Bexar and Guadalupe counties. Don’t miss out! Secure your spot now with the link below!  https://t.co/HZ98mPIBC2 https://t.co/3U2GCZc3Ng
Own an affordable and beautiful Home in San Antonio!   You must meet these program requirements: -300 Sweat Equity Hours -Homeowner Readiness Classes -Must be a First Time Homebuyer -Meet income guidelines  Visit https://t.co/punKduLxBi to learn more and apply today! https://t.co/EyPOf6MIGX
You're invited! 🥳  Please join us in celebrating our next House Dedication on Friday, June 28th. Congrats to our 12 first-time Homeowners!  Also, a special thanks to all of our sponsors and volunteers who made it all possible!  We hope to see you there!  #BuildForBetter https://t.co/kP3cowxfpO
The Presbyterian cluster have been a longtime supporter of Habitat and our families. This spring, they are working alongside Barbara and Marco (homebuyers) to help build their dream home! #HabitatMission #Buildforbetter https://t.co/WriAbrlCFt
Join us for Habitat 101, an info session where you'll get the inside scoop on homebuying essentials and learn how you can qualify for Habitat’s incredible 0% interest mortgage!   Click the link below to secure your spot now! 🙌  https://t.co/puIpbleqgu https://t.co/RzGo7lILhL
Say goodbye to renting and hello to affordable homeownership! 🏡 https://t.co/21uVvwYQCg #BuildForBetter https://t.co/kj5BeG3Gkg
Attention volunteers! We need your help Saturday, July 13th! Use the link to sign up now: https://t.co/Ib7JE076xM https://t.co/m1A05CTpfm
As daylight saving time approaches, Habitat reminds everyone to spring forward and set your clocks one hour ahead!  #DaylightSaving #Habitat https://t.co/gPMSiNV51A
Our Home Centers, administrative offices, and construction sites will be closed March 29th, 30th, and 31st for Good Friday and Easter weekend. #goodfriday https://t.co/dTUqTuIY7r
Habitat is lucky to have supporters like you filling our days with hope and homes!   May your St. Patrick's Day be as bright as the smiles you help us create. 🍀✨ #HabitatGratitude #StPatricksDay https://t.co/tCCJ27t6E6
Summer Intern Spotlight🌟 Meet Sam!   Volunteer and wall build days give Sam the opportunity to connect with families and volunteers by demonstrating her skillset and leading them through various projects! Read more below.  #BuildForBetter https://t.co/LezaIVWjlH
Habitat for Humanity of San Antonio & Guadalupe Valley would like to wish everyone a happy Memorial Day!   Today, we remember and honor all those who bravely gave their lives serving our great Country and protecting our freedom.  #MemorialDay2024 https://t.co/N36MPBPTP7
We loved showing off Rancho Carlota to the HUD Housing Counseling Federal Advisory Committee (HCFAC) who was in town yesterday!  Thanks  for taking the time to see how you impact our local communities.   We love our partnership with HUD, the City of San Antonio and Bexar County. https://t.co/JCkeMjSjod
Thank you to Magali Sanchez, Human Resources Manager at @SarmaFoundation! She provided a great workshop on financial literacy to our summer interns. #BuildForBetter https://t.co/jNsVfsgaza
It started as a blueprint and a dream, but with teamwork, tools, and dedication, this vision is now a reality!   From the first hammer swing to the final touch, every step brought us closer to turning dreams into concrete joy.    Get involved today at https://t.co/CvNxXtLV7U https://t.co/0meS2wXico
There are many ways to give and get involved to help those in need of safe and affordable housing. Click the link to see how you can help today! 💙 https://t.co/uBgfz1OprU https://t.co/BXScUcYKSf
Thank you to everyone who came out to our family sponsor night! We can't wait to work together during our fall build! https://t.co/dFMIDMk0Y8
We had an amazing time this past Friday at our June House Dedication. Congrats to the 12 families that are now first-time homeowners! Thank you to everyone involved in the event and to all the sponsors and volunteers that made homeownership dreams come true! https://t.co/SzS2tWYe6x
Summer Intern Spotlight🌟 Meet Brianna!   She wants to become a Civil Engineer or Architectural Designer! Brianna has really enjoyed learning new skills while interning with Habitat and is excited to continue using them in her future career. #BuildForBetter https://t.co/PibNQrddu2
Shoutout to Holy Trinity Catholic Church for their amazing help on our spring build site! 🏡💙 Together, we're making a real impact in our community. #CommunityBuilders #HolyTrinitySupport https://t.co/pXnEkR6wKu
Thank you to all those who help and support our mission! 🏡💙 https://t.co/ddTXl4s3uX
Thank you to FOR San Antonio Ministries for sponsoring our recent Joshua Build! We had a great time Sunday working together with our summer interns and volunteers from @mosaicchurchsa to build the walls of a family's future Habitat home!  #BuildForBetter https://t.co/WwIWQKXzCx
Happy National Financial Awareness Day! Today we celebrate the importance of being financially educated and empowered.  We strive to help educate our homebuyers about money principles, building better credit and more, all through our homebuyer education classes! https://t.co/9QQN71QUDt
Today Saturday February 10 construction will proceed as planned in San Antonio and Seguin. Rain showers are possible throughout the day. Come prepared for wet and muddy conditions.
🌟 Meet Linds: with incredible passion for building, we are so grateful to have them on our team. Linds dives headfirst into every project, eager to make an impact alongside homebuyers and community volunteers.  Join us in celebrating their commitment to creating lasting homes! https://t.co/8f1xaZ1BqD
